couriers-text.name: couriers-text
couriers-text.description: Send expensable texts to Couriers Branch members. You will need a Couriers & Logistics organisational account to use this tool. This tool is still under development and is not ready for use.

couriers-credentials.name: couriers-credentials
couriers-credentials.description: Get access to Couriers Branch social media accounts. You will need a Couriers & Logistics organisational account to use this tool.
